::Perndabot::

Perndabot nods at BrightBlade's answer, avoiding another tree. The scans 
might help ... although he was positive that an attack on a base like that 
would be suicidal. Almost as suicidal as sneaking into it...

"How long will this take?" he asks, looking back at her. It was a bit easier 
to look into her face now that she was pressing the ball to her chest, her 
curves not as visible from Perndabot's position.
